attributes.comment:
I understand that the USCIS is choosing to raise some of their fees which would
affect our efforts to adopt a child from China. I would graciously request that this
not be done as the expenses that we are paying are overwhelming already and we
are struggling to find ways to pay for the existing payments.

Although you may look at this as only $120 dollars or so, for our family, this is a
lot of money considering the $18,000 plus we are already expecting to pay.

I must admit that, given all of the different agencies and forms that require
payment in order to rescue a child from an uncertain future and bring her into a
home where she can be loved and supported through her life, this is yet another
fee that must be budgeted or borrowed for.

Thank you for accepting and listening to our comments.

Paul Mertens
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Paul Mertens
